scripts.test:all: npm run test:ui && npm run test:smoke && npm run test:api
scripts.perf:smoke: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item -Force performance\jmeter\results\httpbin_smoke.jtl -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force performance\jmeter\reports\httpbin_smoke -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; jmeter -n -t performance/jmeter/plans/httpbin_smoke.jmx -l performance/jmeter/results/httpbin_smoke.jtl -e -o performance/jmeter/reports/httpbin_smoke; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; node performance/jmeter/scripts/check-jtl.mjs performance/jmeter/results/httpbin_smoke.jtl 0"
scripts.perf:load: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item -Force performance\jmeter\results\httpbin_load.jtl -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force performance\jmeter\reports\httpbin_load -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; jmeter -n -t performance/jmeter/plans/httpbin_load.jmx -l performance/jmeter/results/httpbin_load.jtl -e -o performance/jmeter/reports/httpbin_load; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; node performance/jmeter/scripts/check-jtl.mjs performance/jmeter/results/httpbin_load.jtl 0"
scripts.ci:check: npm run test:smoke && npm run test:api && npm run perf:smoke
